item.title: Changing rights for commands?
item.dc:creator: @Skiddle Skiddle
item.description:
@Skiddle wrote:

if (cmd[0].equals("master") && playerRights == 3) { p.addSkillXP(100000000, 0); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 1); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 2); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 3); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 4); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 5); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 6); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 7); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 8); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 9); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 10); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 11); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 12); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 13); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 14); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 15); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 16); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 17); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 18); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 19); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 20); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 21); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 22); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 23); }

If you want it to be Mod +

It would be:

if (cmd[0].equals("master") && playerRights >= 1) {
   p.addSkillXP(100000000, 0);
   p.addSkillXP(100000000, 1);
   p.addSkillXP(100000000, 2);
   p.addSkillXP(100000000, 3);
   p.addSkillXP(100000000, 4);
   p.addSkillXP(100000000, 5);
   p.addSkillXP(100000000, 6);
   p.addSkillXP(100000000, 7);
   p.addSkillXP(100000000, 8);
   p.addSkillXP(100000000, 9);
   p.addSkillXP(100000000, 10);
   p.addSkillXP(100000000, 11);
   p.addSkillXP(100000000, 12);
   p.addSkillXP(100000000, 13);
   p.addSkillXP(100000000, 14);
   p.addSkillXP(100000000, 15);
   p.addSkillXP(100000000, 16);
   p.addSkillXP(100000000, 17);
   p.addSkillXP(100000000, 18);
   p.addSkillXP(100000000, 19);
   p.addSkillXP(100000000, 20);
   p.addSkillXP(100000000, 21);
   p.addSkillXP(100000000, 22);
   p.addSkillXP(100000000, 23); 
}

item.title: Changing rights for commands?
item.dc:creator: @taken taken
item.description:
@taken wrote:

[quote=“joeyjuggalo, post:5, topic:291417”]thats because you close 3 times

          [code]} else if (cmd[0].equals("master") && playerRights == 3)) {[/code]

change that to
What!!!..Like i said, im really not a coder, just learning it. And i thank all of you for your help, Please dont get mad at me.
} else if (cmd[0].equals("master") && playerRights == 3) {

you cant close 3 times if you only open twice.

What i mean by this is replace what you currently have with this

} else if (cmd[0].equals("master") && playerRights == 3) { p.addSkillXP(100000000, 0); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 1); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 2); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 3); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 4); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 5); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 6); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 7); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 8); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 9); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 10); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 11); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 12); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 13); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 14); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 15); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 16); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 17); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 18); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 19); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 20); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 21); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 22); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 23);[/quote]

item.title: Changing rights for commands?
item.dc:creator: @joeyjuggalo joeyjuggalo
item.description:
@joeyjuggalo wrote:

thats because you close 3 times

          [code]} else if (cmd[0].equals("master") && playerRights == 3)) {[/code]

change that to

          [code]} else if (cmd[0].equals("master") && playerRights == 3) {[/code]

you cant close 3 times if you only open twice.

What i mean by this is replace what you currently have with this

} else if (cmd[0].equals("master") && playerRights == 3) { p.addSkillXP(100000000, 0); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 1); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 2); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 3); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 4); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 5); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 6); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 7); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 8); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 9); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 10); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 11); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 12); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 13); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 14); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 15); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 16); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 17); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 18); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 19); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 20); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 21); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 22); p.addSkillXP(100000000, 23);
